taskProgress.description: You are on an archeological dig on Planet X.  3 ancient sites have been found. Your task is to excavate the sites, and date any artifacts with the radiocarbon meter.  Then, once completed, place the red flag beside the sign of the dig site with the oldest artifact.

nextAction.explanation: My subgoal is to place the red flag beside the sign of the dig site with the oldest artifact. Based on the information in my memory, the oldest artifact was found at dig site 2 with an estimated age of 675000. Around me, I see grass and a hole, which are not relevant to my current subgoal. There is no sign directly in front of me. To progress towards my immediate subgoal, I will teleport to dig site 2, where I can place the red flag beside the sign to mark the site with the oldest artifact. This action is based on the hypothesis that placing the flag at the correct dig site will contribute to the completion of my task.
